posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine. 
“I'll take it” trumps any ongoing negotiations.


***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

In other words – NO PMs –  you can comment in thread, but please email to follow up.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=611860&d=1709057102[/IMG]

Bergen, catching, Tolstoi – 200


*** Always open for trades. Especially T206 Hindu or T207 BL Series. *** 

Thanks, Scott
